this game is anger inducing at the start, yet once you learn the maps and game mechanics it becomes very enjoyable. Aside from all the sweaty Doctors and Hags, the killers are awesome characters to learn. The game does come with a horror aspect at the begining of it. Once the first few hours go by the horror aspect leaves and you just use mechanics. Anyway content does come through yet the game can become slightly boring. but yeah :)

Игра хороша спору нет! Но напишу пару моментов!
Купил игру еще на моменте ее разработки и даже не запускал. Ждал полноценного релиза.
И вот в сентябре я ее установил и пошло поехало!) 500 часов наиграл за 3 месяца! 
Трижды достиг 1го ранга за выжевшего!
Игра дико зацепила! Но к сожалению с декабря 2018 года начала немного болеть =( 
С последнего обновления где ввели нового героя. Игра начала иногда не грузить матч...То убийца не прогрузится, то выживший 1 а то и больше  не попадают на матч...сидишь порой ждешь по 3-5 минут окно загрузки в ожидании *Кто первый сдасться и закроет диспетчером игру* ты , убийца или выживший * 
Так же пропала возможность чекать профили стима после завершения матча...
Пропала возможность писать в чат по русски...а читать кирилицу, ну очень сложно иногда...
В каждой катке с доктором вечно творится непонятная дичь... * даже описывать не буду* 
Тут люди пишут про баланс...ну если играть соло с рандомными игроками, то да....сложновато против некоторых манов, игра больше коперативная по связи... жестов в игре  всего 2...и те не понятно что толком означают...
Так что переговоры внутри матча невозможны... Так что скайп,дискорд и прочие войсы в помощь! 
Знакомьтесь в игре с людьми и собирайте пати =)
Ведь если бы баланс пилили бы для рандомов, то дискорд пати была бы слишком имбой!

I definitely spent too many hours on the game to straight out hate it but I can't give this game a thumbs up without later regretting it on my deathbed, so here goes...

Dead by Daylight was once the pilgrim of asymmetrical PvP games with a slasher horror backdrop, except it wasn’t, really, since some ppl in Garry’s Mod had those ideas way before. They just don’t get as popular I guess (the game modes were also pretty unplayable and boring). It has a great base game loop, killer kills survivors, while the latter have to repair generators to power exit gates, open exit gates and eventually leave to win. It has some interesting lore about the entity abducting people to their realm to feed on their fear. It has all the components to make a good game but it just messes everything up with lackluster execution, too few game mechanics, broken perks and economy systems that will never get fixed, all set within a long line of half-assed cash grab seven buck DLC that just enforces  BHVR’s subpar game design. Still: It’s the best game of its kind out there and since F13 and Last Year are a total bust it probably will be the best of its kind forever, so it has that going for it.

You can read the most good and bad of that in different reviews, I just wanna point out some flaws that make the game especially frustrating for me once I put some hundred hours in. This isn’t a complete review by itself, you’ll have to read others or play the game to understand the half of what I’m complaining about here.

[b]F’ing Pallets, how do they werk:[/b] On the survivor side you will get frustrated with pallets and their erratic behavior (no pun intended). Sometimes you’ll hop through a pallet to the other side to the killer ready to be fed on, sometimes you won’t. It all has rules though: If you are walking towards a pallet you’ll hop through before throwing it down no matter what. That’s fine, except when you were waiting next to a pallet, walk up to it when the killer approaches and you press space to throw it down in front of him to create space between you and her. Forward momentum will catapult you through. To stay where you are and simply throw the pallet down you’ll have to stop to reset momentum, then press space. It’s not intuitive, it’s not fun, but it has rules (it was worse before, this is a relatively recent change).

[b]Pallet looping:[/b] On the killer side you probably have to suffer through the most annoying thing that ever was: Pallet looping. Survivors can and will loop you around a pallet location and adjacent walls till you’re dizzy and then drop the pallet on your face once they won’t be able to run another lap without you hitting them. That’s just players using a game mechanic to its absolute best, can’t blame them, really. It kind of makes games extremely boring for both killers and survivors because there is no clever juking involved, no skill, no fun. Just repetitive laps around a wall. Devs [i]fix[/i] this by giving the killer a small speed buff every 15 seconds of ongoing chase until you lose your target or you hit it. Which isn’t really a fix, it just makes sure that you’ll get a hit in after a while.

[b]Totem Placement:[/b] Like, how? I mean, you have a great mechanic at your hands but you mess it up so badly that people despise it even though it could make the game work so much better. The fix would be simple: Don’t put totems next to a generator, don’t put them next to a hook, don’t put them in direct line of sight to survivor spawns. But I know, I ask too much.

[b]Windows/Ledges:[/b] So they reworked things to jump over so there will be a final nail in the coffin for infinite loops (which don’t exist anymore so you’ll have to call them “very long loops” or something, whatever). If you don’t run perpendicular towards a window you’ll not get the benefit of vaulting over it fast but you’ll instead go into this painstakingly slow crawl across the ledge which is what a survivor does naturally when being chased by a chick with an axe. Solves stuff for killers, it’s not fun for the other party.

[b]Camping Hooks:[/b] I don’t know which fresh kind of hell this idea came from but somehow this is a mechanic that never got improved upon. You can kill your way up to pretty much rank 1 if you just hook a survivor and facecamp it so they won’t get saved by their buddies. Pretty boring mechanic, at least for one side, right? Devs thought they can make some clever perks to encourage [i]not camping[/i], e.g. BBQ ‘n Chilli (who makes a barbecue and serves chili with it anyway?). Turns out that perk encourages face campers to stay at their target if they don’t see the full set of remaining survivors lit up once they hooked someone because they know there is someone ready to unhook as soon as they leave. Another example of half-assed game design.

[b]Killer and Survivor Design[/b]
While I’ll always to salute their arts team, the killer mechanic design is so hit and miss that I can’t even. If I look at The Hag (my personal favorite but also a good example) I see a weird and interesting backstory with a character that has great creepy design and abilities that fit her backstory. She brings jump scares, she brings new mechanics with her that change the whole game (introduced totems) and she is fun to play AND fun to play against. She’s the whole package. Let’s compare that to The Clown. Backstory: Sociopath, kills animals, kills a guy, gets found out, runs away, joins circus, kills drunk guests there (who gets drunk visiting a circus?), embraces his inner clown or some shit till one escapes, then he runs away again. End of story. Much wow, such creative. Gameplay is not much better: I can throw bottles that create a gas cloud which slows survivors down. Not fun to play against, not a strong killer. He introduces nothing to the game that wasn’t there already, his perks are mediocre (block vaulting locations, revert generator progression, make healing slow) and the low point of 2018 killer design. While the art is always on point (except maybe Legion, it’s just a dude with a mask) the translation of backstory into game mechanics is just missing. The high point of the 2018 killers probably was the spirit which turned out to be pretty bad as a killer but interesting otherwise. Also, it feels like they just made one ability and then reused it for the next killer Legion: The Spirit can only see scratch marks but not the people she’s chasing and Legion can only see the people, not the scratch marks. The Pig was the other way around: Interesting game mechanics with pretty bad representation of the backdrop SAW-franchise.

All in all you can grab the game on sale if you really want it. You’ll have fun for a bunch of hours but if you are looking for a competitive asymmetrical PvP game you’ll not want this bug-ridden mess of RNG and mediocre game design. It’ll just piss you off once you learned enough to play well.

Fun game, its really exhillerating when youre being chased down and youre gonna die.
Community can be toxic and have some trolls but its not all bad.
Easy to learn, hard to master type of game, lots of variety when it comes to survivors and killers.
Super fun with friends, but still fun with solo queing.

I did come across some stuff that did actually prevent me from playing the game, the Easy Anti-Cheat made it so that i couldnt actually play the game because, number 1, it said i have "untrusted system files", and number 2, there was a DX11 error. I searched a lot across some forums and threads but in the end nothing really worked, now im sitting here waiting for the devs or whatevs to help me out, but if the game does work for you, the game is really fun and enjoyable, but in the unlikely case that it doesnt work for you like it didnt for me, i guess youre fucked.

Oh and i forgot to mention, if you do come across some mindfucking solution for my problems (DX11 and "untrusted system files") feel free to let me know.

Онлайн игра с очень маленьким коммюнити. То есть добиться про сцены ничего из себя не представляет ибо конкуренция не такая большая как в Кс или Доте. Лучший ранг тут это первый - это типо глобала в Кс и получить его можно наиграв в игру часов 600, где же в кс ке тебе что бы стать глобалом нужно играть и играть тысячи часов

Bien, quiero explicar el porqué de la calificación NEGATIVÍSIMA que doy a este juego, que, en realidad, es un juego muy entretenido, con buenos gráficos, con buena ambientación, la idea ex excelente para jugar con tus amigos, para ser competitivo y demás. No le quito sus aciertos al juego, ni  quiero demetirar el trabajo de los creadores, al contrario, tengo 500 horas jugadas y ha sido divertido. El punto importantísimo es, que más allá, de que obviamente, es un juego, sin perder de vista eso, cada día hay más jugadores que hacen uso de los llamados hacks o cheats, trampas, lo cuál ha sido verdaderamente decepcionante y en mi opinión personal han puesto en declive la diversión en el juego, esos hacks se venden por montones en internet, no hace falta buscar mucho, y lamentablemente los desarrolladores del juego, ni STeam, han puesto un alto al abuso de estas trampas, en un juego que es muy simple, no entiendo la necesidad de los pésimos juegadores de usar trampas en un juego, digamos tan básico, si son jugadores honestos, entenderán que es frustrante perder el tiempo en un juego en línea, en el cual sabes que el que tiene el rol de asesino esta cheteado y que hagas lo que hagas no tendrás oportunidad, además de lo que yo considero, este grave problema, al menos para los juegadores honestos que queremos divertirnos, a últimas fechas y actualizaciones, los desarrolladores han dado el 90% de ventaja a aquellos que juegan como asesinos y han dejado a los supervivientes con un escaso 10% de posibilidades, si no es que menos, de conseguir una partida exitosa, han llenado a los asesinos de "Perks" (ventajas) que prácticamente dejan nulo al los jugadores que juegan de supervivientes, que son el 90%, me refiero 4 jugadores cobhtra 1 solo que tiene absolutamente todas las ventajas. En mi caso personal, si me enoja el que este lleno de hackers y cheteros, es molesto no poder jugar sin toparte, cada dìa màs, con esos jugadores de cuarta categoría, que no pueden jugar un juego tan siemple como este sin hacer trampa, son sucios. Obviamente, hay trampas para los supervivientes, pero... en verdad es divertido jugar una partida con 4 desconocidos, usando trampas? La verdadera diversión del juego se ha reducido, a mi parecer, a las partidas privadas, sólo con amigos, en las que sabes que la partida será, al menos lo más pareja posible, dejando de lado las ventajas que los desarrolladores o creadores del juego le han dado a los asesinos, que no son pocas, y están seriamente desequilibradas en cuanto a las habilidades que tienen los 4 supervivientes que deben buscar salir con vida. Es triste, porque es un buen juego, es divertido, si se juega honestamente, o quizás peco de demasiada honestidad? No losé, no uso trampas, ni hacks en ningún juego, si gano es por habilidad, y si pierdo justamente, no me amargo, y en realidad no entiendo la GRAN satisfacción que causa en ganas con trampas, mis intentos por enviar estos comentarios a los desarrolladores han sido en vano, pues no pelan, que pena, y es así que llegué a la conclusión de calificar este juego como AMPLIAMENTE NEGATIVO, lamento decir que espero que a causa de ello, las ventas bajen en algún momento, para que hagan algo, pues los juegos son son gratis y jugar con hackeros, y más este tipo de juegos, es un asco total. Si eres honesto, no te recomiendo el juego a menos que sólo uses partida privada y te diviertas con tus amigos en un grupo cerrado, es todo! Gracias!

DBD- это когда бегаешь 5 генеров, но тебе не дают каплю.
DBD- это когда в игре онлайн 20K-30K, но катка за маньяка ищется 1 год.
DBD- это когда Бубба с инсидиусом кемперит тебя в подвале. Есть вид индивидов Бубб,которые фейскемпят тебя с заведённой пилой.
DBD- это убитый баланс.
DBD- это куча багов.
DBD- это катание сурва на скейтборде.
DBD- это сурвы, которые паллетлупят.
DBD- это тунеллящий манн.
DBD- это когда Майкл на первой фазе оттаскивает тебя от генера, и ты о*уваешь.
DBD- это когда у тебя осколок, но манн занимается дриблингом.
DBD- это когда сурв приседает у паллетки или у окна.
DBD- это когда пила не пилит, а п*здит тебя молотом.
DBD- это гневные сурвы или манны после катки.
В общем игра имеет минусы так и плюсы.
Но если ты топ мансер, то ты будешь получать удовольствие от горящего манна.
Но как для меня игра очень топовая.

데드 바이 데드라이트. 일단 이 게임은 공포 게임인것은 맞다. 나도 2~3시간째 플레이 했었을때는 막 종키고 따라오는놈. 전기톱 키면서 오는놈. 점멸써서 개 빨리 오는놈 등등.... 내 뒤에서 올때마다 오금이 저렸다. 진짜 친구랑 디코켜서 보이스로 말하면서 했는데 친구나 나나 만날때마다 소리지르면서 ㅈㄴ 무서웠다. 근데 평가에는 뭐 사람들이 숨바꼭질이니... 살인자들이 불쌍하다니... 뭐그래서 "야 이게 어떻게 살인자가 무섭고 외롭냐 개무서워 죽겠는데" 라고 했었다. 근데 왠걸 한 8~10시간 정도 하면 이제 감잡힌다. 그렇다 살인자만 ㅈㄴ 놀리는 겜이다 ㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋ 진짜로 숨바꼭질 만약 발전기 다켜서 출구문 여는순간 살인자는 개찐따+소심 플레이를 할 수 밖에없다. 나머지 한놈이 남았을때는 애처로운 눈빛 으로 제발 나가지 말라고 외치는 듯한 느낌으로 서있다. 자기가 한발짝 움직이고 그러면 탈출하면 되거든 ㅋㅋ 아무튼 본 게임을 만든 제작자도 생각하지 못할만큼 살인자를 놀리면서 게임을 깬다. ㅋㅋㅋㅋ 재밌네~~

Esse jogo é totalmente vantajoso para o assassino, quem joga de sobrevivente TOMA NO CU TODA HORA. Alem do assassino ser mais buffado que CU DE SOGRA, O ATAQUE DESSE ARROMBADO ATRAVESSA MIL KM DEPOIS QUE TU PULA UMA JANELA. O jogo não te ajuda em NADA, tu usa caixas para reparar melhor e NÃO MUDA SIGNIFATIVAMENTE PORRA NENHUMA NA HORA DE REPARAR UM GERADOR. Os rastros deixados quando um sobrevivente corre duram mais que UM CULTO, O BAGULHO FICA NO CHAO ETERNAMENTE, E O PERKS PARA DIMINUIR O TEMPO NÃO AJUDAM TANTO. Então se você quer comprar o jogo, OK, porém fique sabendo que vai querer enficar 4 dedos no cu de tanta raiva.

Dead by Daylight is at its best when its played as a party game. Playing this game by yourself or for a competetive reason feels really janky and wrong to me. I've almost never had fun in the game unless I was playing with friends. The killers are mostly fun and interesting to play, some are better than others. The overall tasks are simple enough to achieve as a survivor, but really makes the game is your ability to co-ordinate with your friends to trick and dip the killer.

Buy this game if you're looking for a fun party game for five people, don't buy it for any other reason.

[h1]黎明死線－緊張的鬼抓人遊戲 [/h1]
　黎明死線是一款鬼抓人的遊戲，通常是一個殺手對抗四個倖存者，倖存者得要同心協力修好發電機逃脫，而殺手需要在他們修好發電機並開啟出口之前將他們全數上鈎子殺死。
　在殺手方面，追逐並且抓到倖存者會讓你有種「終於逮到你了」的快感；而在倖存者那一方，時大時小的心跳聲以及在追逐時的緊湊音樂，讓在扮演倖存者的我時常保持的警戒心態，猶如身歷其境一般。總而言之，雙方都有獲得原本該獲得的東西。
　這些只是遊戲的內在因素，而它們是美好遊玩經驗的因子。而外在因素就布一樣了，玩家素質參差不齊，雖然很少會遇到爛的玩家，但是在這款需要多人合作的遊戲裡面，有素質差或是爛線的倖存者真的有點@&$!，而這種情況發生在殺手上會更糟，守屍、爛線殺手等等。這邊要特別提一下爛線殺手，在這遊戲裡殺手是主機，也就是說，殺手一爛線，全部人都會感覺到卡頓，導致遊玩經驗的不愉快。[spoiler]素質爛、爛線玩家驅散(#`Д´)ﾉ[/spoiler]
　[h1][/h1]
[h1]評分[/h1]
 [table]
    [tr]
        [th]品項[/th] 
        [th]分數[/th][th]原因[/th]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]氣氛[/td]
        [td]8/10[/td]
        [td]個人覺得很緊張刺激，會有真的在鬼抓人的緊張感。[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]遊戲平衡[/td]
        [td] 6/10 [/td]
        [td]經過幾次的改版之後雖然有些技能感覺無用但是大致平衡[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]玩家素質[/td]
        [td]5/10[/td]
        [td]大多不錯，不過有時還是會遇到老鼠屎就很不爽[/td]
    [/tr]
[/table]

 [h1]優缺點[/h1]
✓很多技能配置+附加品，搭配不同的殺手有不同的玩法
✓緊張刺激感十足
✓破壞友情GAME（算是）
✖有些玩家素質實在很差，像是守屍仔以及茶包仔
✖邀請機制很差，朋友沒辦法主動進去自訂義的房間
✖由於主機就是殺手，所以遇到爛線鬼就非常賭爛
✖在非常少的時候可能會導致遊戲被拖延的非常久
wacho cerrame el juego lpm >:vvvvvv
È um jogo sensacional, incrivelmente divertido tanto com amigos como solo, uma pena ele roda a 15fps em meu pc

延迟杀是什么情况？
我上一秒还爆机子勾引屠夫，绕过了屠夫，正在钩子底下救人呢，下一秒就给我瞬移回屠夫面前了？而且还是我没见过的一片墙角？
而且进游戏十有八九会有人掉线，三打一我打个吉尔？

不太推荐网速不高到飞起的朋友玩这个（就算UU加速器都拯救不了）……估计跟朋友开黑玩会很有意思，但大多数的匹配只让我感到难受，延迟杀得飞起

而且我选当屠夫的时候总是进不来人这不就意味着买这游戏就是为了被杀而存在的吗吗卖批

This game is not playable anymore. The ranking system is not working, toxicity is at an all-time high, the meta is stale and slowly robbing this game of any fun. Its frustrating and hopeless honestly. Don't buy this game, spend your money on games with a better community, more caring devs and better balancing, this game is just a tragedy at this point.

A friend of mine and I recently started a spreadsheet, writing down the killers we get and so far it proves my point. Its 50/50, on the one hand there are the competetive tryhard killer, who only play blight and use meta-perks and addons, on the other hand its russian bubbas who facecamp you at 5 gens. If the community isn't going to fix this problem, then the developers have to. Make the game more divers, make perks more viable and make items more reasonable. Its the only way this game will survive.

P.S: The developers put not effort what so ever into this game, because they are brainless monkeys who don't care about this pile of crap some would call a videogame. It's not that hard looking at the statistics and changing the numbers on certain perks to make this game more diverse and interesting, but for BHVR that seems like too much work. Honestly, do something with the money this game generates and hire talented and creative people or maybe devs that work at all.

And now: a nearly 30GB update that changes one map and changes a few numbers on two killers. I mean, what the fuck? Healing progression is regressing two times as fast as it takes to heal a survivor, furthermore encouraging the use of too strong med-kits. Way to go to make the gama more healthy, good job!

This game is being developed by the most untalented, lazy and downright idiotic developers I have ever seen. The only language they seem to understand is "money", because they are not reacting to their community unless a problem is so bad its affecting sales. This game needs some serious competition, maybe then the devs will be encouraged to actually work on this sad excuse of a game.

In all honesty, screw you, bhvr.

PS: rubberbanding is fun btw

PPS: killer literally plays itself after the patch. you are LUCKY if you get one or two gens done, no suspenseful matches anymore, this game has never been more unbalanced
Fun
jogo bem legal, recomendo 100%

alright alright, so i dont even know where to start off with this game. this game has so many isssues with it but thats what makes it fun, one of the biggest problems tho with this game is that new people are VERY MUCH not welcome, doesnt matter if you play killer or survior, you will be taken advantage of. another problem with this game is inconsistency, there is so much bulls*** that happens on both sides it gets frustrating to the point were you want to punch a hole in the wall but you just have to live with it, though this game receives updates that fix alot of thing they also create lots of issues with them and when these updates come out everyone almost has to alter there playstyle quite frequently. i can say though after you can get used to this the game is quite fun. killer and survivor are both fun to play once you learn the base of the game, the game experience is way better with friends because there is a major lack of communication with surviviors that gives this feel of fear which makes sence on the devs part. overall this game is fun but you have to learn the foundation before you can actually play the game.

Oyunun hayranları tarafından linç yememek için öncelikle şunu belirteyim, oyun gayet sürükleyici ve eğlenceli. Ama amınakoyduğum oyununda, amınakoyduğumun survivoru oynamak gel gör ki imkansız. Amına koyduğum katili seni bikere yakaladımı, her adım başı bulunan amınakoyduğum kancasına asması. Tek derdim amınakoyduğum oyununda bu. Neden adım başı kanca var lan. İt ler, şuursuzlar. Survivor, katil arası denge koca bir 0. Yetmezmiş gibi OP katil dlc leri çıkıo. O zaman bi batman survivor yapında sefasını çekelim. Amıyagoyduklarım.(Campleynlerin %99 da da mikropenis sendromu varmış)

Edit: Oyunun hayranı olmuşum amk ama hala campleyenleri sikim
I spend a lot of hours in this game and yes, I regret it.
matchmaking is a lil fucked same with hit boxes but its fun

Selten so ein schlecht programmiertes Spiel gesehen. Die Hits die man von Killern bekommt sind einfach nurnoch buggy, man steht zum Teil hintern den Killern und man wird trotzdem getroffen oder auf der anderen Seite von einem Fenster und man bekommt einen Hit ab. Das einzige was von den Machern kommt "Wenn ihr nicht zufireden seid spielt doch einfach was anderes" und was will man von so Menschen noch erwarten... . Also empfehlen kann ich DbD niemandem außer man will kompletten Augenkrebs.

Mittlerweile findet man nichtmal mehr richtig spielen da das Spiel fast zu 80% immer im Loadingsceen abstürtzt, dann muss man den gesamten Rotz schließen und nochmal neu starten. Dabei verschwinden aber alle Addons und Offerings die man mitgenommen hat, von daher lohnt es sich richtig etwas seltenes mitzunehmen da man es ja eh nich benutzen kann...

Do yourself a favor and don t buy this unbalanced infuriating game, that cannot bother to address many issues that have been there for years. The Devs are stuck in their own bubble of what they think will get them most amount of players in a short time and the community makes ruining others people's experiences a sport. 

Sincerely, somebody who really wanted to keep playing this game for much time to come.
Muito bom

After 2500 hrs of playing this game I feel like writing a review. So basically, this game still feels like it just came out. So many bugs I have figured out by myself, I do not want to name any of them here and now, otherwise I will get banned for sure lol (We all know the devs logic). And after the last update the game feels so weird. Feels like dropping FPS. Between low and ultra settings there aren't many differences as before. Killers still do hit through pallets. Especially Hillbilly does. Moreover after 2 years of playing this game, they didn't improve their ranking system. Basically you will find more noobs the higher you rank up. Makes sense, doesn't it ? 
Moreover they added a system where you can't de-rank below rank 15 if you already achieved it. That's stupid, because brown rank is empty as fuck and new players have to wait ages for finding a lobby. I still recommend this game because it's funny to bully killers.

[장점]
1. 진입장벽이 낮으면서도 감 잡힐수록 고일 수 있는 게임

------------

1. 서치할 때 꽤 높은 확률로 무한로딩 오류 뜸 (해결법: 그냥 컨알딜 하고 작업종료 뿐)
2. 게임이 시작되어 로딩할 때 약간 낮은 확률로 로딩바가 차지 않는 오류 뜸... 이건 곧 로딩하다 팅긴 현상 (해결법: 컨알딜 하고 작업종료... 이 경우는 게임이 응답없음 상태로 되어있음)
3. 대기실에서 핑상태를 쉽게 확인할 수 있는건 좋은데 빨핑방이 너무 자주 잡힘 (해결법: 딱히 없음... 그냥 나왔다가 초핑 방 만날 때까지 다시 서치... 올해에 나라별 서버 분리 한다곤 들었는데...과연?)
4. 대기실에서 영어밖에 안 쳐짐... 음 아무래도 외국인들과 같이 게임해야되다보니 일부러 그렇게 해놨나보긴 함
5. 살인마하고 픈 유저 중에서 이제 갓 시작한 유저인 경우는 대기실에 사람들이 오지게 안 옴
20랭 부터 1랭까지 있는데 18~20랭 살인마가 방 만들면 사람들이 너무 안 와서 10~20분 기다려야 한다고 함 
아무래도 18~20랭의 생존자들은 이제 막 데바데 사서 시작하려는 10시간 미만의 유저들이 대부분이라 그런가 봄

------------------------

사람마다 조금씩은 다르겠지만 게임을 처음 할 때는 공포게임처럼 느끼면서
심장 쫄깃하게 하다가도 플레이시간이 누적되어 익숙해지면 공포게임이라기 보다
그냥 술래잡기로 느껴짐..
아! 대신 깜짝 놀라게 만드는 살인마도 몇몇 있긴 함...ㅋㅋ
아무래도 갑자기 뿅 하며 나타나는 염주 애드온 스피릿이나 해그가 젤 깜놀 살인마가 아닐까 싶다
근데 재미는 있지만 단점이 너무 많은 게임...
그치만 재미도 있다 보니 단점들이 너무 아쉬울 뿐
Spanend, Herausvordernt und Geil. Das Spiel macht voll Laune.

運営自体が問題点を指摘されても認めて修正に向かう形もなく、嫌気がさしてcivでもやれば？と発言したのはあまりにも有名
それ以外にも統計を理解していないのか100％所有しているようなスキルも25％と算出する統計の取り方や、VCチームに関して何も考えていなかった為にスキルを持たずともパーティさえいればキラーが不利になる状況。
壊れ性能のスキルも謎統計で問題とせず、過去の大会で後方がゲームをプレイしていないのでは？と疑われる試合を頻発するなど話題には事欠かない運営となっております。
運営よりもプレイの事書けよ！という方。ご安心ください。2,3試合に1回はチームに当たり煽られるキラー（妨害すればポイントになるため）、キラーから散々逃げ回った挙句に切断して逃げる。ぶっ壊れスキルによる嫌がらせ等の楽しい生活が待っております。
生存者専門の方は当方は感知いたしませんが、キラー専門あるいはキラーを一度でも触れる方は鋼のメンタルを有した上でプレイすることをお勧めします。
